column4: chazco:  I would use 8.04 instead since it's still supported for a while yet.
- 8.04 suffers from the same bugs as 8.10 and 9.04 :(
- Been discussed on here loads of times... wifi broken with certain card combinations, tcp_window_scaling broken and in 9.04 broken video playback and evtouch. Bug reports exist for all these.
